trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism that data-bound controls use to request data-related operations from data source controls when data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 提供数据绑定控件用于从数据源控件请求与数据相关的操作时检索数据的机制。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the DataSourceSelectArguments class to request that a data source control performs additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件使用 DataSourceSelectArguments 类请求数据源控件执行更多与数据相关的操作的结果集，如对数据进行排序或返回数据的特定子集。

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 这些与数据相关的操作都用枚举<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how the DataSourceSelectArguments class supports these data-related operations.
trans-unit.target: 下表指示 DataSourceSelectArguments 类如何支持这些与数据相关的操作。

trans-unit.source: |Capability|Related DataSourceSelectArguments properties| |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>| Data-bound controls explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind data, which calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method of the data source control they are associated with.
trans-unit.target: |功能 |与相关的 DataSourceSelectArguments 属性 | |----------------|--------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>| 数据绑定控件显式调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法来绑定数据，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>与之关联的数据源控件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this way, the data-bound control retrieves data from the data source control on demand.
trans-unit.target: 这种方式，数据绑定控件从数据源控件按需检索数据。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method accepts a DataSourceSelectArguments parameter, the data-bound control is responsible for creating and managing a DataSourceSelectArguments object and passing it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method when it retrieves data from the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法接受 DataSourceSelectArguments 参数时，数据绑定控件负责创建和管理 DataSourceSelectArguments 对象以及将其传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法从数据源控件检索数据时。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, data-bound controls might not need any additional data-related capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，数据绑定控件可能不需要任何其他与数据相关的功能。

trans-unit.source: In this case, data-bound controls pass an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A> arguments object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，数据绑定控件将传递<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>自变量对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A>

trans-unit.source: For sorted result sets, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于已排序的结果集，数据绑定控件检查的数据源视图<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A>属性在运行时间，并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a sorted result set from a data source control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件可以作为一个单独的操作，请求已排序的结果从数据源控件设置通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 对象上的属性传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: For paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于分页方案，数据绑定控件检查的数据源视图<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>属性在运行时间，并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求数据的子集从分页的数据源控件通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 对象上的属性传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a total row count for paging scenarios, data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索分页方案的总行数，数据绑定控件，请检查数据源视图的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>属性在运行时间，并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a total row count from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property on the DataSourceSelectArguments object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求总的行计数从分页的数据源控件通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>DataSourceSelectArguments 对象上的属性传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method returns, the total row count is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法返回时，总的行计数包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the DataSourceSelectArguments properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 设置任何 DataSourceSelectArguments 属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能，如果<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>时将引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新默认实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数创建具有的类的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>属性初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>属性初始化为零。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified sort expression.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>使用指定的排序表达式的类。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceSelectArguments constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> initialized with the specified expression and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to zero.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceSelectArguments 构造函数创建具有的类的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>初始化使用指定的表达式和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>属性初始化为零。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: A sort expression that data source controls use to sort the result of a data retrieval operation before the result is returned to a caller.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件使用对结果进行排序的数据检索操作结果返回到调用方之前排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified starting position and number of rows to return for paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>类的指定起始位置和要为分页方案返回的行数。

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceSelectArguments constructor creates an instance of the class with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties initialized to the values provided for the `startRowIndex` and `maximumRows` parameters.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceSelectArguments 构造函数创建具有的类的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>属性初始化为提供的值为`startRowIndex`和`maximumRows`参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the data row that marks the beginning of data returned by a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 标记由数据检索操作所返回的数据的开始的数据行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows that a data retrieval operation returns.
trans-unit.target: 最大数据检索操作返回的行数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> class with the specified sort expression, starting position, and number of rows to return for paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>用指定的排序表达式、 起始位置和要为分页方案返回的行数。

trans-unit.source: A sort expression that data source controls use to sort the result of a data retrieval operation before the result is returned to a caller.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件使用对结果进行排序的数据检索操作结果返回到调用方之前排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data row that marks the beginning of data returned by a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 标记由数据检索操作所返回的数据的开始的数据行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows that a data retrieval operation returns.
trans-unit.target: 最大数据检索操作返回的行数。

trans-unit.source: Adds one capability to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> instance, which is used to compare supported capabilities and requested capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到的一个功能<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>实例，用于比较支持的功能和请求的功能。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls call the AddSupportedCapabilities method for each capability the data source supports.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件对数据源支持每个功能调用 AddSupportedCapabilities 方法。

trans-unit.source: After the capabilities are added, any call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> method compares the supported capabilities against the requested capabilities (represented by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> properties).
trans-unit.target: 在添加功能后，任何调用到<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>方法比较与请求的功能支持的功能 (通过设置表示<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>属性)。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a capability such as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> is not added but the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果如功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>未添加但<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29>方法抛出异常<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object with the sort expression set to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>使用排序表达式设置为<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty>对象

trans-unit.source: The property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object created with the default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 该属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象使用默认值创建<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.%23ctor> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Empty property when you want to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29> method of a data source view class without any additional arguments.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用空的属性，当你想要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>的不带任何其他参数的数据源视图类的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> instance is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>实例是否等于当前实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to test equality using the various properties of the objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>类重写<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法以测试使用的各个属性的对象的相等性。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> properties are all equal in value, the Equals method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>属性值中所有相等，Equals 方法返回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> to compare with the current one.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>要与当前实例进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> is equal to the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>等于当前实例; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 返回的哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum number of data rows that a data source control returns for a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值代表数据源控件的数据检索操作返回的数据行的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The MaximumRows property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 值属性支持分页方案。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method if the view supports paging.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件检查数据源视图的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>属性在运行时间，并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法如果视图支持分页。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据绑定控件无法添加该功能，并分页属性在设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>在数据检索操作中，传递到数据源视图对象<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>可能引发异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control for paging by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A> and MaximumRows properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件可以通过设置从分页的数据源控件请求的数据子集<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>和值属性上的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.StartRowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如果任一<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>设置属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>时将引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of data rows that a data source returns for a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 最大数据源返回的数据检索操作的数据行数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which indicates that all possible data rows are returned.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0，指示返回所有可能的数据行。

trans-unit.source: Compares the capabilities requested for an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29> operation against those that the specified data source view supports.
trans-unit.target: 为请求的功能的对比<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%29>针对指定的数据源视图的那些操作支持。

trans-unit.source: The RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError method is used by data-bound controls to compare additional requested capabilities represented by the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class, such as the ability to sort or page through a result set, with the capabilities supported by the data source view.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件使用 RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError 方法进行比较的属性所表示的其他请求的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>类，如排序或分页结果集，支持的数据源视图的功能的能力。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The view calls its own <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method for each possible capability defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 视图将调用其自身<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>中定义的每个可能的功能的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilityError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError method is called.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如果任一<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>设置属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>调用 RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError 方法时引发异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The data source view that performs the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 数据源执行数据检索操作的视图。

trans-unit.source: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.
trans-unit.target: 数据源视图不支持指定的数据源功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data source control should retrieve a count of all the data rows during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值在数据检索操作过程中，数据源控件是否应检索的所有数据行的计数。

trans-unit.source: The RetrieveTotalRowCount property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: RetrieveTotalRowCount 属性支持分页方案。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to request a total row count from the data source control during the data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`数据检索操作期间从数据源控件请求的总行数。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定数据源视图是否支持检索总行数。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source supports it, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property is set by the data source control during the course of a data retrieval operation and the total data row count is returned in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源支持它，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>数据检索操作的过程期间由数据源控件设置属性，并且在返回的总数据行计数<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>属性，数量为一个值中返回方法的输出参数。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> properties are set, but the currently bound data source control does not support the requested capability, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 如果任一<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>设置属性，但在当前绑定的数据源控件不支持请求的功能，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>时将引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RaiseUnsupportedCapabilitiesError%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceView%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control should retrieve a total data row count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据源控件应检索总数据行计数;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an expression that the data source view uses to sort the data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源视图使用检索到的数据进行排序的表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: The SortExpression property supports sorting scenarios.
trans-unit.target: SortExpression 属性支持排序方案。

trans-unit.source: A string that the data source view uses to sort data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 数据源视图使用检索到的数据进行排序的字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String.Empty> is returned if sort expression has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Empty>如果尚未设置排序表达式返回。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the starting position the data source control should use when retrieving data rows during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示在数据检索操作过程中检索数据行时，应使用数据源控件的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The StartRowIndex property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 值属性支持分页方案。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls check a data source view's <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property at run time, and add a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> capability using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> method if the view supports paging.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件检查数据源视图的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>属性在运行时间，并添加<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName>功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29>方法如果视图支持分页。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.AddSupportedCapabilities%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data-bound control fails to add the capability, and the paging properties are set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the data source view during a data retrieval operation, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception might be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据绑定控件无法添加该功能，并分页属性在设置<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>在数据检索操作中，传递到数据源视图对象<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>可能引发异常。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: As a separate operation, the data-bound control can request a subset of data from a data source control by setting the StartRowIndex and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A> properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个单独的操作，数据绑定控件可以请求数据的子集从数据源控件通过设置值和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.Select%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments%2CSystem.Web.UI.DataSourceViewSelectCallback%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.MaximumRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting row position from which a data source control retrieves data.
trans-unit.target: 从其数据源控件的起始行位置检索数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0, which indicates that the starting position is the beginning of the result set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0，表示的起始位置是结果集的开始部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows retrieved during a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在数据检索操作过程中检索的行数。

trans-unit.source: The TotalRowCount property supports paging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: TotalRowCount 属性支持分页方案。

trans-unit.source: Data source and data source view controls differ in their internal implementation for how to retrieve total row counts.
trans-unit.target: 数据源和数据源视图控件的有关如何检索总行数其内部实现方式不同。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether a data source view supports retrieving a total row count during a data-retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定数据源视图是否支持检索数据检索操作期间的总的行计数。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source supports it, the TotalRowCount property is set by the data source control during the course of a data-retrieval operation, and the total data row count is returned in the TotalRowCount property, much as a value is returned in an output parameter of a method.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源支持它，TotalRowCount 属性由数据源控件设置过程中的数据检索操作，并总数据行计数返回 TotalRowCount 属性中，如同在方法的输出参数中返回的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of data rows retrieved by the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 由数据检索操作检索的数据行的总数。
